title: Video: Adna – Smoke EP
body:
This live performance of tracks lifted from **Adna’s** recent **_Smoke_** EP is absolutely intoxicating.

Intimate yet expansive, fragile yet resoundingly powerful, it’s confident and understatedly brilliant. Check out performances of Beautiful Hell, The Prettiest and Run Lucifer below.
